entry.title: Love, Vega.
entry.summary:
Author: dancingqunn

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 881Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: After months away from the paradisiacal island of Vega, you return for one of the most anticipated events of the year: your best friend Kory's wedding. Amid laughter, warm hugs, and landscapes that spark nostalgia, the island isn’t the only place holding deep memories.As you dive into wedding preparations and reunite with old friends, you find yourself face-to-face with Jason, someone who once meant more than he should have. Between parties filled with music and dancing under the stars, the romantic atmosphere and unresolved tensions make you question whether you're truly ready to leave the past behind and give what you once had a second chance.

entry.title: why the hell did i paint these walls white?
entry.summary:
Author: valentinegirl_07

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,301Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 45

Summary: he wonders if you’ve noticed all the takeout coupons and meal vouchers he’s so carefully disguised in your mail, or if you’ve figured out that it’s not a glitch from your power company that mysteriously pays your electric bill. he wonders if you’ve ever stopped to consider just how often you find lost cash on your walk to work, or if you’ve taken the time to think that all the help you get from ‘the universe’ is really from your undead boyfriend.you stare up at him with wide, scared eyes, only moving to wipe the rain away from your face. more than anything, you’re confused, unsure why red hood— a vigilante who you were convinced was just gotham folklore, is standing above you, his feet placed on your jason’s grave.

entry.title: Dear Daddy Long Legs
entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,294Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 360

Summary: “I’m looking for an application for a scholarship.”“You didn’t have to hack our systems to apply for a scholarship,” Tim deadpanned, “I wasn’t aware you could go to college if you’re legally dead.”His eye twitched. “I’m looking for an applicant,” he amended, “She already applied.”Tim finally looked at him. “She?”_____Inspired by the novel Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster. Jason Todd saves you from getting mugged one night and ends up being your mysterious benefactor, funding your college experience. Featuring awkward "zero rizz" Jason Todd and several members of the Bat Family.Jason Todd x Fem!Reader - does not use y/n

entry.title: My Beloved Lazarus
entry.summary:
Author: MrsJasonTodd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,046Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 312

Summary: “When he had said these things, he cried out with a loud voice, “Lazarus, come out.” The man who had died came out, his hands and feet bound with linen strips, and his face wrapped with a cloth. Jesus said to them, “Unbind him, and let him go.””‭‭Jason Todd has known his best friend since the 3rd grade, when she took the chance to befriend the strange kid that only ever played by himself on the playground. And though the two were quite the odd pair, they were inseparable. As they matured, their bond deepened, never growing apart even as everything around them changed. But as a sudden tragedy strikes, it shatters their idyllic world and tears them apart. The aftermath is cruel and unforgiving, the deep scars forever lingering. But despite the distance and the passage of time, their hearts never truly let go of the tender love they once knew. Each tried to move on, but memories of their childhood and the bond they shared lingered.Eventually, the red string of fate in its clever, clever ways, will find a way to draw them back together by the very stitching of their wounds.

entry.summary:
Author: Neriumssmut

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,242Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Jason Todd hears rumors that The Scarecrow has been metaling with a new fear formula that would be able to tap into a person's dream physically. Changing it into whatever he wants and also being able to keep them there in his own personal nightmare playground. Jason knows Batman will only try and take him into custody again once he hears of it and he's had enough of the back and forth with the same villains. Scarecrow wants nothing but death and suffering and that's exactly what he's gonna get.Ayla Rivens, otherwise known as Dusk, a survivor turned avenger, Dusk is a ruthless, dream-walking vigilante with a personal vendetta against Scarecrow. entry.title: Another Day
entry.summary:
Author: jjenthusee

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,340Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 38

Summary: After a rough night on patrol, Jason ends up at your window. He hadn’t heard from you in a while, but in his attempt to clear his madness, he realized that he should have been helping you all this time. For all you’ve known each other, you and Jason found comfort in one another. You always worry about him that sometimes it makes you forget about yourself, but Jason reminds you that helping someone isn’t one-sided. That no matter what, he knew you were going to hold his hand through it all and he will always reach out for you as well.

entry.title: Devoted Little Thing
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,073Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 335

Summary: After the death of your boyfriend, Jason Todd, your life has never been the same. You abandon everything you've ever known: your job working for Batman as a detective, your home, your friends. That is until three years after his death, your life is saved by a mysterious vigilante calling himself the Red Hood.You assume it was a one-off; that the infamous anti-hero just happened to be in the right place at the right time. But you're finding his calling card everywhere. He's around every single corner―you can't seem to get rid of him. The mystery of his identity brings you back to Bruce in hopes of finding out who he is. But as intimidating as the Red Hood is, with his blurry morals and all, you can't help but find yourself falling for him. Maybe he's the answer to your loneliness.
